`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(t.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:[(0,n.jsxDEV)(t.figcaption,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-title":"","data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"night-owl",children:"use-media-query.tsx"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"F:\\startup\\ui-layout-lib\\ui-layout\\ui-layout-public\\apps\\web\\src\\content\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-9aaeb9ab-d928-4b69-9653-6081092c2ddb.mdx"},this),(0,n.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#011627",color:"#d6deeb"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"night-owl",__rawString__:`import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'

export function useMediaQuery(query: string) {
  const [value, setValue] = useState(false)

  useEffect(() => {
    function onChange(event: MediaQueryListEvent) {
      setValue(event.matches)
    }

    const result = matchMedia(query)
    result.addEventListener('change', onChange)
    setValue(result.matches)

    return () => result.removeEventListener('change', onChange)
  }, [query])

  return value
}
